descriptionHtml:
Have you ever dreamed of an Weapon, that can destroy all your enemies?
weapon that makes the people feel a kind of fear, they never felt before?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can craft the arrows in each forge. you must have the steel smithing perk.
You need 1 Leathersrip
It is under "Other"
